name: Bunker Punks
description: Bunker Punks is a fast paced rogue-light FPS set in a dystopian future. Run a group of revolutionaries and raid corporate strongholds for supplies, weapons and armor. Customize your bunker, train your gang and tear down the corporate government.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: 2.5 GHz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8600 or equivalent, 256 MB memory Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: 2.5 GHz dual core Graphics: GeForce 8600 or equivalent, 256 MB memory Storage: 500 MB available space
